title: Bedeni Giants Paving
about: Bedeni Giants Paving is located on the side of Kvemo Kartli, in the municipality of Tetritskharo, near the village Oraga, 1600-1700 meters from sea level. Giant Paving is the conditional name of the surfaces of volcanic lavas. They are articulated in polygons, as a result of lava cooling. Bedeni Giant Paving is a marvelous and very interesting sighting
